attributes.action: review sentencing procedures of 'drug dealers' and drug traffickers' with the aim of determining whether swifter and longer sentences (including life sentences for traffickers) will help deter woud be offenders, and thus reduce the drug crisis in 'The United Kingdom'. We also propose consideration of providing incentives for drug purchasers to provide information on suppliers and dealers. These incentives may include rehabilitation and monetary incentives.
